name: Idle Champions: Spelljammer Pilot Gromma Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Gromma (if you don't already own them) Spelljammer Pilot Gromma Skin An Epic Feat for Gromma 7 Gold Gromma Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
